template:
<xf:set var="$hasExisting" value="{{ !empty($option.option_value.apiKey) }}" />
<xf:formrow rowtype="input" label="API Key"> <xf:textbox name="{$inputName}[apiKey]" value="{{ $hasExisting ? '********************' : '' }}" placeholder="{{ $hasExisting ? 'Enter new API key to change' : 'Enter API key' }}" maxlength="255" /> <xf:hint>Your NCMEC CyberTipline API key.</xf:hint> </xf:formrow>
<xf:formrow rowtype="input" label="API Secret"> <xf:passwordbox name="{$inputName}[apiSecret]" value="{{ $hasExisting ? '********************' : '' }}" placeholder="{{ $hasExisting ? 'Enter new API secret to change' : 'Enter API secret' }}" maxlength="255" autocomplete="new-password" /> <xf:hint>Your NCMEC CyberTipline API secret.</xf:hint> </xf:formrow>
<xf:formrow rowtype="input" label="Environment"> <xf:select name="{$inputName}[environment]" value="{$option.option_value.environment}"> <xf:option value="test">Test</xf:option> <xf:option value="live">Live</xf:option> </xf:select> <xf:hint>Select the NCMEC API environment. Use "Test" for development and "Live" for production reporting.</xf:hint> </xf:formrow>
